sources.description:
Martian dominatrix lands in Scotland with a robot sidekick and an ultimatum: Surrender your men... or face interplanetary consequences! üëΩüí•
When a latex-clad emissary from Mars crash-lands near a remote Scottish inn, she demands Earth's strongest males for her planet's dying population. Trapped by her force field and killer robot, eight strangers must outwit this cosmic femme fatale before London falls next.

Original Title: Devil Girl from Mars (1954)
Black & White version: https://youtu.be/TXMm8TclN6Y
